abstract: Announcement that St Louis Cardinals third baseman David Freese had won the Most Valuable Player award of the National League Championship Series sets off a rousing round of applause from teammates and management, busy celebrating the team's victory in the NLCS that has put them on the road to the World Series.
snippet: All around the victorious St. Louis clubhouse Sunday night, David Freese’s manager and peers interrupted their merrymaking long enough to praise Freese to anyone who asked.
lead_paragraph: All around the victorious St. Louis clubhouse Sunday night, David Freese’s manager and peers interrupted their merrymaking long enough to praise Freese to anyone who asked.

headline.main: The Cardinals See Greater Things Ahead for a Series M.V.P.
headline.print_headline: The Cardinals See Greater Things Ahead for a Series M.V.P.
headline.seo: Cardinals See Greater Things Ahead for Freese
